data.title: Great local "dive bar"
data.text: Has a lot of character(s)! Good food and good people serving you. Big Pete the manager is a great guy!

data.title: Nice neighborhood pub and grill.
data.text: My wife and I come here periodically for the evening. The bar food is fairly routine and the drinks are reasonable during happy hour. Their menu has been downsized and the chicken drummies taken off. This was my favorite food so we don't go as often as before. The service is marginal and you should look at your bill before paying it as they overcharge for things you did not get. I don't think it is dishonesty but in- attention to the job at hand by the servers. The place is kind of a dive but that gives it all the charm as I detest " sports bars". They do have the usual bar activities such as karaoke,bingo and Texas Holdem poker. The parking is more than ample as the bar sets in a small shopping center. The clientele is mostly blue collar of all types. Have never seen any altercations due to drunks probably because no one wants to drink enough to risk a DWI.

data.title: Good time
data.text: This is a good bar with enough room to move around.  They usually have something going on. Darts, poker, bingo, bean bags.  Good prices, haven't tried the food but it looks good

data.title: Scoops
data.text: I've gone to Scoops since I moved to the area 9 months ago and have always had great service. The food is good but, the staff has always been great. I go once or twice a week and I'm always greeted by name. I've read another review about throwing ice ... do you really think the business can control everyone that visits? Give them a try and you may find that it's a great pub to visit.

data.title: Poor management representation
data.text: We went to Scoops on 4-3-12.  It had been a long time since our last visit.  We go out 3 times a week and live in Coon Rapids.  The Happy Hour was of less value than others in the area.  The food was decent and out service was very good.  At the end of our service we were informed that they no longer accepted out DMC card for 1 free meal.  We asked for clarification from the manager.  A very rude bar manager came over and and treated us very poorly and acted like we should know about this.  We asked if there was some sort of compromise.  We had ordered a number of beers.  Don't tell me she didn't have margin to make an offer of a no cost beer or two.  She stormed off and again was rude.  I had to twist my wife's arm to try something different on this trip.  No more back to Anoka were they know what service is.  No DMC cards but good service and a fair value.  Scoops in a crap hole.

data.title: Fun Bar...Darts and pool...
data.text: Fun Bar...Darts and pool really good burgers, and only a dollar on wednesdays.
